MazeObjects

Class Bottom

  • java.lang.Object
    • MazeObjects.MazeObject
      • MazeObjects.Bottom

  • public class Bottom
extends MazeObject
    The Bottom MazeObject is invisible and exists only to prevent the array in the maze file from having nothing in some of the places in the array of stack descriptions. The maze reader expects something to be save in every place.

    Like all MazeObjects, it implements a translate method that returns a copy of the maze object moved to a different location, and a very weak equals method that acts as a somewhat more specific version of the instanceof operator.
